# Welcome to My Code Repository
> I Solemnly Swear I'm Up To No Good

###### A collection of my code/examples/mistakes are available here for you to learn from.
###### Most of my source will be found on Bitbucket.org, but I may be using Github as a mirror from time to time. 


Find me on the web:
[Facebook](http://facebook.com/lordhg4) | [Google+](https://plus.google.com/u/0/110480127810366580401) | [LinkedIn](http://in.linkedin.com/in/lordhg4) | [Website](http://hemanthg4.undo.it) | [Twitter](http://twitter.com/lordhg4) | [Bitbucket](https://bitbucket.org/hemantg4)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Hemanthg4.github.com
